name: Liz ~The Tower and the Grimoire~
detailed_description:
Liz and her mentor Aisha, are talented witches. But despite their talent, a thief manages to steal a powerful tome called the "Grimoire of Darkness" from them.

Chasing after the man, they end up near the town of Brunach. Aisha, senses danger emanating from the area and orders Liz to stay behind.

However, unwilling to heed her mentor's words, Liz heads into the town to continue her pursuit of the thief.

Features:

  • Classic RPG Experience
  • Explore an immersive fantasy world
  • Turn-based Combat
  • Crafting

short_description: After having the magical grimoire stolen, Liz and her mentor Aisha, pursue the thief to a town called Brunach. Sensing danger, Aisha tells Liz to wait for her. Liz however, decides to disregard Aisha's order, and continues her pursuit of the thief.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
